archimate:ApplicationService.name: Access Management Service
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
Shares the functionality of allowing users to make use of i) IT services, ii) data, and/or iii) other assets. Access management helps to protect the confidentiality, integrity and availability of assets by ensuring that only authorized users are able to access or modify the assets.
Based on ITIL v3 https://www.axelos.com/Corporate/media/Files/Glossaries/AXELOS-Common-Glossary.pdf

properties.value: [ Exposed for reuse as main service | Exposed for reuse as supporting service | Reused ]
